medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening midback pain, progressive leg weakness, and intermittent bladder and bowel incontinence.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 months prior to presentation, with progressive intensity over time, leading to difficulty with ambulation and new-onset fecal and urinary incontinence.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease with stent placement, and hypertension.
medical_history.social_history: The patient was born in the Philippines but immigrated to the United States at 21 years of age. He served in Vietnam for 4 years and spent 10 months a year in the Philippines since retirement. He reported no use of tobacco, alcohol, or illicit drugs.
